import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-list', templateUrl: './nav-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-list.component.css'] }) export class NavListComponent { @Input() pag : { offset: number, limit: number, current: number, total: number } = {offset:0,limit:20,current:1,total:0}; public totalPags : number[] = [] public totalPages() : void{ console.log([...Array(this.pag.total).keys()].map((v)=>{return v+1})) this.totalPags = [...Array(this.pag.total).keys()].map((v)=>{return v+1}) } /* ngOnInit(){ this.totalPages() console.log(this.pag) } */ }
